guidelines: Uses semantic ul and li elements for proper list structure
Maintains logical reading order for screen readers
List items inherit accessibility from their content
Respects reduced motion preferences in responsive transitions
wcag_compliance: WCAG 2.1 AA - 1.3.1 Info and Relationships (semantic structure)
accessibility.aria_support: Standard list semantics through ul/li structure

best_practices: Use semantic HTML content within list items
Choose direction based on content and layout requirements
Consider responsive behavior when using large size
Use no_gap sparingly and only when design requires it
Test with various content lengths to ensure proper wrapping
Ensure sufficient contrast if items have background colors
Keep item content concise for better readability
technical_notes: Uses CSS flexbox for layout control
Responsive gap adjustments for large size only
Box model reset applied to root element
Sass math functions for responsive calculations
No JavaScript dependencies - pure CSS solution

notes: Component has stable status in source
